column4: Can anyone help me uninstall cairo-dock? I have problems with it and it won't show up on Add/Remove programs
does photoshop work on linux..?
works with cedega
or similar
is that like Wine?
pretty much but its got some extra goodies, cedega is also closed source and paid for
that's right... it's like $5 a month! Is there a free program that runs Photoshop?
no idea, it not something of interest to me
do you have a .cairo-dock folder in ~/
not sure, it's in my Home/Niche/ folder... is that ~/ ??
yes ~/ = /home/<your name>
ok so yeah it's in there... What do I do?
rm it
can I sudo nautilus it too?
never sudo nautilus, you use gksu nautilus
if you are simply removing that folder then use rm -rf ./.cair-dock
I think I did it with "sudo rm -r ~/cairo-dock" is that correct too or hazardous?
I wanted to uninstall it though b/c it's not working so I can try it again... Did that uninstall it or do I need to do more?
I wanted to uninstall it though b/c it's not working so I can try it again... Did that uninstall it or do I need to do more?
dpkg -l | firefox
you trying to remove firefox?
haha no, I am trying to remove cairo-dock
oh ok, if you close cairo-dock and delete that folder, you will get stock settings when it is next run
